column4: guys, I'm running Gutsy.. simple probably but I can't find it, how do I simply place the home folder onto the desktop? every time I try it doesn't allow me to, saying I can't copy a folder onto itself... ?
can't find it under the main menu (the circular menu button0
sorry you you have to right click the main menu then edit menu under system tools check configitation editor
in configuration editor you go to apps>nautilus>desktop
that's interesting.. a whole devoted to this... is this new or was it there in past distros ?
is it possible prevent workspace overlap ?
yea... but that's an extra task, maybe a way to make it default - not to overlap ?
I assume I am - I have such pretty graphcis
in the compizconfig manager you could set the windows to snap
sounds like it might work.. thanks
